title: Authors and Citation
text: Beniamino Green. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Green B (2023). zoomerjoin: Insanely fast fuzzy joins. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://beniaminogreen.github.io/zoomerjoin/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {zoomerjoin: Insanely fast fuzzy joins},   author = {Beniamino Green},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://beniaminogreen.github.io/zoomerjoin/}, }

title: Insanely fast fuzzy joins
text: INSANELY, BLAZINGLY FAST fuzzy joins R. Implimented using MinHash cut number comparisons need made calculating matches. results matches return orders magnitude faster matches.

title: Insanely fast fuzzy joins
text: must Rust installed compile package. rust website provides excellent installation script never caused issues. Linux MacOs, can install Rust : Windows, use rust installation wizard, found .

title: Insanely fast fuzzy joins
text: install Rust, able install package :

title: Insanely fast fuzzy joins
text: package provides following functions, designed near drop-ins corresponding dplyr/fuzzyjoin commands: lsh_left_join() lsh_right_join() lsh_inner_join() lsh_full_join() lsh_anti_join() ’s snippet showing use lhs_left_join() command: start two corpses like combine, corpus_1: corpus_2: two Corpuses can’t directly joined misspellings. means must use fuzzy-matching capabilities zoomerjoin: ZoomerJoin finds joins matching rows just seconds.
code: corpus_1 ## # A tibble: 500,000 × 2 ##        a field ##    <dbl> <chr> ##  1     1 ufwa cope committee ##  2     2 committee to re elect charles e. bennett ##  3     3 montana democratic party non federal account ##  4     4 mississippi power & light company management political action and educ… ##  5     5 napus pac for postmasters ##  6     6 aminoil good government fund ##  7     7 national women's political caucus of california ##  8     8 minnesota gun owners' political victory fund ##  9     9 metropolitan detroit afl cio cope committee ## 10    10 carpenters legislative improvement committee united brotherhood of car… ## # … with 499,990 more rows corpus_2 ## # A tibble: 500,000 × 2 ##         b field ##     <dbl> <chr> ##  1 832471 avrp studios inc ##  2 832472 avrd design ##  3 832473 avenales cattle co ##  4 832474 auto dealers of michigan political a ##  5 832475 atty & counselor at law ##  6 832476 at&t united way ##  7 832477 ashland food & liquors ##  8 832478 arvance turkey ranch inc ##  9 832479 arizona federation of teachers ## 10 832480 arianas restaurant ## # … with 499,990 more rows start_time <- Sys.time() join_out <- lsh_inner_join(corpus_1, corpus_2, n_gram_width=6, n_bands=20, band_width=6) ## Joining by 'field' print(Sys.time() - start_time) ## Time difference of 12.00186 secs print(join_out) ## # A tibble: 2,534 × 4 ##         a field.x                                                      b field.y ##     <dbl> <chr>                                                    <dbl> <chr> ##  1  65793 texas veterinary association of general practitioners … 8.91e5 texas … ##  2 441535 swanson superior forest productsi                       1.07e6 swanso… ##  3  62805 texas beverage association, inc.                        8.64e5 texas … ##  4 359164 rob les real estate partnership                         8.95e5 rob le… ##  5  32309 north american coal corp pac texas                      8.65e5 north … ##  6  99796 46th senate district democrat-farmer-labor party        1.17e6 16th s… ##  7  20711 california landscape dimensions                         9.90e5 califo… ##  8  63059 scott douglas & mcconnico llp,                          1.21e6 scott … ##  9 105402 seafarers political activity                            8.71e5 seafar… ## 10  70410 barry lee o connor & associate                          9.12e5 barry … ## # … with 2,524 more rows

title: Fuzzy anti-join using minihashing — lsh_anti_join
text: Fuzzy anti-join using minihashing

title: Fuzzy anti-join using minihashing — lsh_anti_join
code: lsh_anti_join(   a,   b,   by = NULL,   n_gram_width = 2,   n_bands = 45,   band_width = 8,   threshold = 0.95 )

title: Fuzzy anti-join using minihashing — lsh_anti_join
text: first dataframe wish join. b second dataframe wish join. named vector indicating columns join . Format dplyr: = c("column_name_in_df_a" = "column_name_in_df_b") n_gram_width length n_grams used calculating jaccard similarity. best performance, set large enough chance string specific n_gram low (.e. n_gram_width = 2 3 matching first names, 5 6 matching entire sentences). n_bands number bands used minihash algorithm (default 40). Use conjunction band_width determine performance hashing. default settings (.2,.8,.001,.999)-sensitive hash .e. pairs similarity less .2 >.1% chance compared, pairs similarity greater .8 >99.9% chance compared. band_width length band used minihashing algorithm (default 8) Use conjunction n_bands determine performance hashing. default settings (.2,.8,.001,.999)-sensitive hash .e. pairs similarity less .2 >.1% chance compared, pairs similarity greater .8 >99.9% chance compared. threshold jaccard similarity threshold two strings considered match (default .95). similarity euqal 1 jaccard distance two strings, 1 implies strings identical, similarity zero implies strings completely dissimilar. '

what: Plot S-Curve for a given LSH function — lsh_curve
title: Plot S-Curve for a given LSH function — lsh_curve
text: Plot S-Curve given LSH function

title: Plot S-Curve for a given LSH function — lsh_curve
Plot S-Curve for a given LSH function — lsh_curve
text: n_bands: number LSH bands calculated band_width: number hashes band

title: Plot S-Curve for a given LSH function — lsh_curve
text: plot showing probability pair proposed match, given Jaccard similarity two items.
